library(R.utils)\
library(readr)

# Paths to compressed files

meta_gz \<- "data/metalog/human_core_wide_2025-12-28.tsv.gz"\
taxa_gz \<- "data/metalog/human_metaphlan4_species_2025-12-28.tsv.gz"

# Unzip (does nothing if already unzipped and overwrite = FALSE)

R.utils::gunzip(meta_gz, overwrite = FALSE)\
R.utils::gunzip(taxa_gz, overwrite = FALSE)

# Paths to uncompressed TSVs

meta_tsv \<- "data/metalog/human_core_wide_2025-12-28.tsv"\
taxa_tsv \<- "data/metalog/human_metaphlan4_species_2025-12-28.tsv"

# Read into R

metadata \<- readr::read_tsv(meta_tsv)\
taxa \<- readr::read_tsv(taxa_tsv)
